full_summary:
# 5000067504 DITA Exchange Tender Announcement
## Tender ID: PW-22-01004896
### Original Fee Estimation: $100,000 - $300,000
**Published Date:** August 19, 2022
**Closing Date:** September 2, 2022 at 2:00 PM EDT

The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) invites interested bidders to participate in the 5000067504 DITA Exchange tender process. The tender activity is an Advance Contract Award Notice under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA). Interested vendors must register with Industry Canada prior to accessing the tender document and responding to this invitation.

## Tender Profile:
* **Tender Category:** Goods and Services
* **G-SIN Code:** *N7030 ADP Software (Human Resources, Law and Accounting)
* **Expected Delivery Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Expected Start Date:** Subject to change based on tendering outcome

## Tender Package:
The tender package can be downloaded from the following location: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/19/bc00597d63ebf2f0956c5f7c51f5ffde/5000067504_acan_en.pdf (English) or  https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/19/d3e94c7b20f648d14f10bc68f9ba4365/5000067504_acan_fr.pdf (French).

**Note:** Documents are in Portable Document Format (PDF). A Adobe Acrobat Reader or equivalent can be used to view and print the documents.

## Contact Information:
* **Contact Name:** Solicitation / Demande de soumission
* **Email:** solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca
* **Phone:** Not Applicable

Responses are to be received and registered with the Contracting Authority by September 2, 2022. Late bid submissions will not be considered. Interested bidders must cease and desist once the conversion period has ended.
